itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 77-80 : followHIM Favorites
title: Doctrine & Covenants 77-80 : followHIM Favorites
description:
Five-minute clip of Hank and John's favorite part of this week's Come, Follow Me Study.

John shares his experience with a return missionary who said, "My mission was not what I expected, but turned out more beautiful than I planned." Doctrine & Covenants 80:3 teaches "Wherefore, go ye and preach my gospel, whether to the north or to the south, to the east or to the west, it mattereth not, for ye cannot go amiss.

Hank shares President Gordon B. Hinkley's advice that "The habit of saying thank you is the mark of an educated man or woman." 
Doctrine & Covenants 78:19 teaches "And he who receiveth all things with thankfulness shall be made glorious;"

Please leave a review on the podcast.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
